title: Romance Through the Eras: 14 Excerpts
description: A book of 14 Historical Romance excerpts by 7 authors to introduce you to stories that will sweep you away to experience intrigue, revenge, danger, adventure and passion. The excerpts are from novels that span the eras from the Viking Age to the Medieval era, to Regency England, to France and even to Edwardian elegance. The heroes are Vikings, knights, Highlanders, British lords, privateer captains and more! Our website: http://romancingtheeras.com/
author: Barbara Bettis
